Miscellaneous
On 10 December 2016 I received two tickets for a football match on that date. The total value of these was £200. Donor: Mr Jon Smith.

On 3 January 2017 I received two tickets, with associated hospitality, to attend a football match, with a total value of £300. Donor: AFC Bournemouth, Vitality Stadium, Dean Court, Kings Park, Bournemouth, BHT 7
AF; Registered Company Number: 06632170. (Registered 09 January 2017)

E 7
NA. The combined value of these benefits was £150. (Registered 09 February 2017)
